content: space beg3dccl ch2 3dccl in same space *ch2 3dccl ch2 3dccl in next chain space* repeat from * to * around ch2 close with a slip_stitch in top of beg3dccl 12 3dccl 12 ch2 space round 3 skip all cluster from round 2 work only in chain space slip_stitch in next chain space ch1 2 single_crochet ch3 2 single_crochet in each chain space around close with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet cut yarn and weave in ends 48 single_crochet 12 ch3 space round 4 skip all single_crochet work only in ch3 spot and in space *2 single_crochet in next chain space 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space double_crochet in next chain space between 2nd and 3rd single_crochet ch1 2trcl ch2 2trcl in next chain space ch1 2trcl in next chain space with new color stand single_crochet in any space between 2nd and corner st ch1 2trcl ch2 2trcl in next chain space ch1 double_crochet in 3rd single_crochet *ch3 popcorn in next ch3 spot ch3 single_crochet in space between next chain space 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space 2 single_crochet in next chain space 4 times* next 2nd and 3rd single_crochet* repeat from * to * around repeat from * to * around omitting the last 2 single_crochet close omitting the last single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet and cut with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet yarn 12 popcorn 12 single_crochet 24 ch3 space 4 2trcl 2 double_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 10 single_crochet 4 ch1 space 2 ch2 space per side 1 corner 2trcl round 5 skip all single_crochet and popcorn with new color stand single_crochet in any ch3 space before popcorn *ch2 round 12 ch1 single_crochet in same st as join or with new color stand single_crochet single_crochet in next ch3 space* repeat from * to * around omitting in same st as join *single_crochet in next 6 st last should be the double_crochet the last single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet do not cut yarn half_double_crochet in next chain space half_double_crochet in next cluster 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space skip next 24 single_crochet 24 ch2 space 2trcl and next ch1 space treble_crochet ch1 5 times treble_crochet in next 2trcl skip next ch1 and next 2trcl 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space half_double_crochet in next cluster round 6 skip all single_crochet work only in chain space half_double_crochet in next chain space single_crochet in next 10 st* repeat from * to * slip_stitch in next chain space ch1 and single_crochet *ch3 4dccl in next chain space around omitting the last single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet ch3 single_crochet in next chain space* repeat from * to * around 6 treble_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 16 single_crochet 4 ch1 space per side 1 corner ch1 space omitting the last single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet do not cut yarn 12 4dccl 12 single_crochet 24 ch3 space round 13 ch3 counts as your first double_crochet or with new color stand double_crochet in joining st *double_crochet in next
